means: 发音不和谐的，粗腔横调的

sentence.Network_en: They produced the most cacophonous beat of pop music.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们制造了流行音乐最不协调的节拍。

PerfectNetExp.abs: one of the world's highest population densities, which makes for a seething (原意为沸腾)mass of people, buildings and cacophonous(发音不和谐的)traffic.

entry.def: If you describe a mixture of sounds as cacophonous, you mean that they are loud and unpleasant.

sentences.sentence: "as cacophonous as a henyard"- John McCarten
